CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 5, 1958, pg. 1, reads: "Queen and Her Court - Lovely Iva Lewis (center) was crowned 'Miss Golden Jubilee' at Moreell Park, Aliquippa, on Monday night. One of 143 contestants when the contest began May 12, the field was reduced to the above five on June 21. Popular Rosalind King, daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Oliver King of Aliquippa, ranked fourth when the voting was over.  Left to right" Janice Johnson, fifth; Miss King: the 'Queen'; Patty Felgram, second, and Janet McKittrick, third.  Total vote count was 459,748.  The winner received 86,487 votes.  Second and third place contestants received 77,117 and 75,326 votes respectively.  Miss King won 51,310 votes, while Miss Johnson earned 43,128.  Burgess James Bruno gave the welcome address at the opening celebration, which featured the crowning of the queen and her court. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Woman reaching to crown on head of "Miss Golden Jubilee queen" Iva Lewis holding scepter, in Moreell Park, Aliquippa
